casebody.data:
[Civil No. 779.] WILLIAM SIDOW, Appellant, v. RAMON F. BORQUES, Administrator of the Estate of Archie Borques, Deceased, Appellee. APPEAL from the District Court of the Second Judicial District in and for the' County of Gila. F. M. Doan, Judge. J. S. Sniffen, and Robert E. Morrison, Attorneys for Appellant. Edwards & McFarland, Attorneys for Appellee. February 11, 1902.

Affirmed.
